entry.title: lowRISC/rv_plic
entry.summary: Implementation of a RISC-V-compatible Platform Interrupt Controller (PLIC). DEPRECATED in favour of the OpenTitan PLIC: https://github.com/lowRISC/opentitan/tree/master/hw/ip/rv_plic
